summary: The Republic of Serbia  is a country in Southeastern Europe.
full_text: Pristina International Airport   is an international airport located 15 kilometres  southwest of Pristina, Kosovo. It handles over 1.6 million passengers per year. It is under the authority of the Republic of Kosovo and is the only port of entry for air travelers to Kosovo. Pristina International Airport is a secondary hub for Adria Airways of Slovenia. The airport is named after Adem Jashari, a leader of the Kosovo Liberation Army.
title: Pristina International Airport
